title: (x) Scoreboard font - Dig 1 & 2 {Stephen}
content:
I'm looking for a font that looks like the lights on a scoreboard.   
   
Any suggestions?
author: rburke

comments.content:
Dig 1 and 2 are free at [Neo2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010233914/http:/www.neo2.es/index1.html). Click on "TIPOS"   
   
Stephen
